jrobots.simulation.simulationObjects

Class PilotZombie

  • java.lang.Object
    • jrobots.simulation.simulationObjects.AbstractPilot
      • jrobots.simulation.simulationObjects.PilotZombie
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class PilotZombie
extends AbstractPilot
    PilotZombie is an anonymized Pilot type.

    With all internal data stripped off, any action can only be replayed, but not re-rendered.

    A Pilot without brain, hence the term PilotZombie.

    See Also:

        public PilotZombie(AbstractPilot pilot)
        Quick and painless.
        They even can multiply.

        In fact, this produces a zombie duplicate of the pilot or PilotZombie.

        Parameters:
        pilot - - unharmed. unchanged
